name: Chaos Heroes
summary:
Collect and train your heroes, gather your teammates, strengthen your crew and wipe out the enemy in thrilling. 

CHAOS HEROES has over hundreds of addictive quests, awarded game mechanics and constantly evolving game world.

An exceptionally rich and addictive game

Choose between over 100 unique and varied Heroes, from melee bruisers, agile archers and powerful mages

Develop and upgrade your skills while collecting equipment sets.
An immersive experience with friends or go solo on your own in numerous battles

Blend cooperation with your friends as you battle against competing guilds for elite prizes 

Develop team play and strategies to rule the world of Chaos Heroes 
Fight through the PVP Arena for awards fame! 

Fight against a horde of enemies in challenging special events!
